definition[0]: to do something to show that you are sorry about the problems you have caused someone
example[0]: I’ll make it up to you somehow.
example[1]: He was looking for a way to make up to her for what he had done.
definition[1]: to say nice things to someone or be very friendly to them in order to get an advantage for yourself – used to show disapproval
definition[2]: to be given a higher position in an organization
example[2]: He was a security guard before he was made up to reception manager.
